definitions.definition: To knock (a person) over by striking them across the neck or upper body with an outstretched arm , mimicking the motion of running into a low clothesline.
examples: The referee called a personal foul, when he clotheslined the running back.

main_definition: ( Canada , US , informal , transitive ) To knock (a person) over by striking them across the neck or upper body with an outstretched arm , mimicking the motion of running into a low clothesline.
